section.p: The custom attributes are defined in the /conf/sac/PCRFCustomRuleAttributeDictionary.xml file as follows.

fig.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="RuleAttributeDictionary.xsl"?> <attributeDictionary xmlns="ruleAttributeDictionary"> <attribute name="CC-Request-Number" valueType="IntegerValueType"> <resultContext type="CDR" maxOccurs="1"> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_ESTABLISHMENT</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_MODIFICATION</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_TERMINATION</ruleSet> </resultContext> <domain name="NETWORK"/> </attribute> <attribute name="CC-Request-Type" valueType="StringValueType"> <resultContext type="CDR" maxOccurs="1"> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_ESTABLISHMENT</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_MODIFICATION</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_TERMINATION</ruleSet> </resultContext> <domain name="NETWORK"/> </attribute> <attribute name="RAT-Type" valueType="StringValueType"> <resultContext type="CDR" maxOccurs="1"> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_ESTABLISHMENT</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_MODIFICATION</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_TERMINATION</ruleSet> </resultContext> <domain name="NETWORK"/> </attribute> <attribute name="IP-CAN-Type" valueType="StringValueType"> <resultContext type="CDR" maxOccurs="1"> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_ESTABLISHMENT</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_MODIFICATION</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_TERMINATION</ruleSet> </resultContext> <domain name="NETWORK"/> </attribute> <attribute name="origin-realm" valueType="StringValueType"> <resultContext type="CDR" maxOccurs="1"> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_ESTABLISHMENT</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_MODIFICATION</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_TERMINATION</ruleSet> </resultContext> <domain name="NETWORK"/> </attribute> <attribute name="diameter-realm" valueType="StringValueType"> <resultContext type="CDR" maxOccurs="1"> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_ESTABLISHMENT</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_MODIFICATION</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_TERMINATION</ruleSet> </resultContext> <domain name="NETWORK"/> </attribute> <attribute name="diameter-host" valueType="StringValueType"> <resultContext type="CDR" maxOccurs="1"> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_ESTABLISHMENT</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_MODIFICATION</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_TERMINATION</ruleSet> </resultContext> <domain name="NETWORK"/> </attribute> <attribute name="diameter-application-id" valueType="LongValueType"> <resultContext type="CDR" maxOccurs="1"> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_ESTABLISHMENT</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_MODIFICATION</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_TERMINATION</ruleSet> </resultContext> <domain name="NETWORK"/> </attribute> <attribute name="diameter-command-name" valueType="StringValueType"> <resultContext type="CDR" maxOccurs="1"> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_ESTABLISHMENT</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_MODIFICATION</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_TERMINATION</ruleSet> </resultContext> <domain name="NETWORK"/> </attribute> <attribute name="Supported-Features" valueType="StringValueType"> <resultContext type="CDR" maxOccurs="1"> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_ESTABLISHMENT</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_MODIFICATION</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_TERMINATION</ruleSet> </resultContext> <domain name="NETWORK"/> </attribute> <attribute name="Access-Network-Charging-Address" valueType="IPAddressValueType"> <resultContext type="CDR" maxOccurs="1"> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_ESTABLISHMENT</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_MODIFICATION</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_TERMINATION</ruleSet> </resultContext> <domain name="NETWORK"/> <attribute name="Default-EPS-Bearer-QoS" valueType="IntegerValueType"> <resultContext type="CDR" maxOccurs="1"> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_ESTABLISHMENT</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_MODIFICATION</ruleSet> <ruleSet>IPCAN_SESSION_TERMINATION</ruleSet> </resultContext> <domain name="NETWORK"/> </attribute> </attributeDictionary>
